conbody.p:
In the Design Studio (DS) Workbench application, projects are top-level containers that store and organize a projectâ€™s resources. Design Studio provides designers for:
Domains (related to Domain Designer)
Enquiries (related to the Enquiry Designer)
Versions (related to Screen Designer).
Additional models take place for the new browser run with Edge Connect:
Menu (related to Menu Designer).
Composite Screens (related to Eson Designer).
Context Enquiry (related to Eson Designer).
Each designer will only contain its own model files (for example, the Domain Designer only contains model files of Domain Designer). Model files of each designer are organized using folders. .
